name: BoredIdeas-GiveMeSomethingToDo
0:
”Alexa, open bored ideas.”
”Alexa, give me something to do from bored ideas.”
”Alexa, open bored ideas and tell me what to do.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bored ideas
des:
Ask for something to do, and Alexa will give you something to do!

This skill will keep you entertained with many fun activities.

To start, just say "Alexa, open bored ideas".

You can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
